1.content: The reins of power can corrupt, be corrupted, and sometimes utterly destroy. But once in a generation, they breed men worthy of entire sections of history textbooks, men who are the subject of debate and controversy, men for the ages, who will be remembered by every genereation that will come as long as history is recorded. When the Terran Colonial Republic broke up in A.D 3478, it splintered into three empires: The Confederation of Border Colonies, the Parliment of Core Worlds, and the Republic of Median Worlds. These worlds constantly found themselves at conflict, occasionally the Lasgun had to talk for them. But dispite politics, borders, and cultures, one thing traversed them all: The Mercantile Bureau of Colonial Resources, the megacorporation that had, as is the expression, fingers in every pie. Mining installations in the borders, Offices in the Median Worlds, Headquarters in the Core Worlds. It was the one thing remaining from the splitup of the Terran Colonial Republic. The figure that arose to bring unity to a disjointed worlds arose in AD 3527. They were..
1.title: The beginning. (Plus Prologue)

choices: My Governor, the military advisor is here to see you.
My Governor, the economic advisor is here to see you.
My Governor, a representative of the capitol is here to see you.
Nothing, as she was cut off by an artillery shell.
11.content:
Gorrask Helmschiled was a stout, muscular man who was born in the Median Worlds capitol of Roggask. It was a bustling city world, with brief patches of forest. He was a politician's son, born to Gir Helmschiled, his father, and Anna Helmschiled, his mother. His father was a muscular man, his mother was a more rotund woman who always wore a secretarial skirt and workshirt. Gorrask wasn't the type for politicking in the capitol so as soon as he graduated from his university, the Political Science University of Roggask, He moved to a world not far from the capitol, a habitational world named Hormant, in the Grishtall system, and ran up the political ladder. He hit the top at 44, the governor of the world. It was far below what he would achieve.

Gorrask sat at his desk, stroking his long, groomed black beard, as the notifier built into his desk, a small black screen within the glass, lit up. His gaunt secretary spoke, and said..
11.title: The Middleman Emperor Begins.

info.brief_description: What will YOU do when handed the reins of power? Lusty politician? People's leader? Decide
info.description:
Welcome to the story! Here's the rules:
You can make your character gain weight, male or female
You can go wild as you want with sex descriptions,
You can NOT powergame something into existance (I.E, "He magically gained psychic powers and detonated the dude across the room")
You can kill off the main character, but make it believeable.
PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE BE DESCRIPTIVE.

And, Above all...




HAVE FUN!
info.pretty_title: The Pen, the Gun, and the Tongue.
